basics.name: Marcelo Rondon
basics.label: Front-End Developer | Designer
basics.summary: Front-End Developer and UX/UI Designer specializing in React and WordPress development. I build reusable UI components, accessible web experiences, and scalable design systems.

work.name: Asheville Dispensary
highlights: Built reusable UI components integrated into WordPress via custom PHP and JavaScript plugins.
Developed an internal asset management system using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
Implemented a scalable design system in Figma, improving brand coherence across web, print, and packaging.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams (design, marketing, operations) to deliver projects on deadline.
Managed Git workflows with branching, merging, and pull requests.

work.name: VegAvengers Marketing
highlights: Built a high-performance React/TypeScript/Vite website with responsive design and backend-integrated searchable components for VegFests and animal sanctuaries.
Translated UI/UX mockups into clean, maintainable front-end code highlighting the organization's mission.

work.name: ADA Compliance Consulting
highlights: Brought multiple organizations to WCAG 2.1 compliance; optimized for screen readers and keyboard navigation.
Contracted with River Phoenix Center for Peacebuilding on accessibility and performance improvements.

work.name: Legal Impact For Chickens
highlights: Developed scripting tools for secure data management; handled confidential materials with discretion.

work.name: The Green Phial
highlights: Redesigned and maintained WordPress site using HTML5, CSS3, PHP, and JavaScript (ES6+).
Translated UI mockups into responsive, accessible front-end code; improved performance and SEO.
Collaborated directly with brand owner to align digital presence with brand ethos and UX goals.

work.name: Mantera Advertising Agency
highlights: Collaborated with agency retail clients to develop visually impactful graphics and marketing materials under tight deadlines.
Efficiently incorporated client feedback into designs, ensuring timely delivery and client satisfaction.
Facilitated direct communication with clients to effectively deliver desired graphics.

work.name: Success Academy Charter Schools
highlights: Implemented innovative education strategies and utilized learning frameworks to teach ELA and math remotely.
Produced educational content and visual aids, applying design thinking to optimize learning experiences and enhance educational outcomes.

work.name: The Fine Print Magazine
highlights: Led a team of photographers and managed artistic direction for various events, capturing impactful visual stories.
Developed artistic direction for fundraising events, utilizing design and photography skills to enhance event visibility and engagement.
